Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
ðŸ“¦ Add comprehensive dependencies & validation for imo_tools

Installed and verified all dependencies required for imo_tools library.

Updated Dependencies (requirements.txt):
- pdfplumber>=0.10.0 (already installed)
- pandas>=2.2.0 - Data manipulation and CSV processing
- openpyxl>=3.1.2 - Excel file support
- requests>=2.32.0 (upgraded from 2.31.0) - HTTP requests
- PyPDF2>=3.0.0 - PDF form filling capabilities
- tqdm>=4.66.0 - Progress bar support
- python-dotenv>=1.0.1 (upgraded from 1.0.0) - Environment management
- rich>=13.7.0 - Enhanced console output

New Validation Suite:
- tests/test_toolbox_imports.py - Comprehensive validation script
  * Tests all 5 tool imports (BaseTool, ParserTool, APIMapperTool, CSVMapperTool, PDFMapperTool)
  * Validates 8 dependency imports
  * Tests tool functionality (parsing, mapping, extraction, error handling)
  * Tests logging capabilities
  * Provides usage summary and examples

Test Results:
âœ“ All 5 tools imported successfully
âœ“ All 8 dependencies available
âœ“ All tool functionality tests passed
âœ“ Logging works correctly
âœ“ Error handling validated

Features:
- Full dependency coverage for all imo_tools use cases
- Parser: AI-heavy parsing with structured data support
- APIMapper: HTTP requests for API documentation
- CSVMapper: pandas & openpyxl for data manipulation
- PDFMapper: pdfplumber (extract) + PyPDF2 (fill)
- Enhanced UX: rich console output, tqdm progress bars

Usage:
Run validation: PYTHONPATH=. python tests/test_toolbox_imports.py
Install deps: pip install -r requirements.txt

Auto-Propagation:
When child repos run "update from imo-creator", they receive:
- Updated requirements.txt with all dependencies
- Comprehensive validation suite
- All imo_tools capabilities

Version: All dependencies installed and validated
Status: Production-ready, comprehensive testing suite

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
